\w Crispus|strong="G2921"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* synagogue leader, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w household|strong="G3624"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Corinthians|strong="G2881"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* heard \w the|strong="G2532"\w* message \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* baptized.

“\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* persuading \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w worship|strong="G4576"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G2316"\w* ways \w contrary|strong="G3844"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,” \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w remained|strong="G4357"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* Corinth \w for|strong="G1063"\w* quite \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w* saying goodbye \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* brothers. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* shaved \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cenchrea|strong="G2747"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w keep|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w vow|strong="G2171"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w made|strong="G1161"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w sailed|strong="G1602"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w*, \w accompanied|strong="G4862"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Aquila.

Paul’s Third Missionary Journey Begins (Acts 13:1–3; Acts 15:36–41)

\w After|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w spent|strong="G4160"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* Antioch, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* traveled \w from|strong="G2532"\w* place \w to|strong="G2532"\w* place \w throughout|strong="G1330"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w region|strong="G5561"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Galatia|strong="G1054"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Phrygia|strong="G5435"\w*, \w strengthening|strong="G4741"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.
